description: This file initializes and renders the main React application component, attaching it to the DOM element with id 'root'. It imports React, ReactDOM, a CSS stylesheet, and the App component, then renders the App within React.StrictMode for development checks.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the React application.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM.
